requests.security criteria: right your security criteriaHere if you have one (example : authentification creteria)
requests.request: the file where you write your prompt , the file should be on your directory example : analyze_prompt.txt
requests.files_to_be_included: write the files you want to inculde and analyze here (example: *.py , *js)
requests.files_to_be_excluded: write the files you want to exclude and not to analyze here (example: *.chatgpt , .gitignore , package.json)
requests.dist_dir: write here the name of the output directory example (analyzedFiles)
requests.output_extension: write here the extension of your analyzed files example (.chatGPT)
requests.rules: the file where you write your rules , the file should be on your directory example : analyze_rules.txt
